description.en: The foundation for YDF has been laid for consistent growth and sustainability. Each component coalesces perfectly to deliver the appropriate balance in the protocol to support the underlying infrastructure that will make the project exist and ultimately grow in perpetuity. YDF is the next blue chip in the making.
